snippet: Wimbledon champion Andy Murray has pulled out of next week's Rogers Cup in Toronto so he can give his body time to rest before he sets out in defense of his Olympic singles title at the Rio Games....
lead_paragraph: Wimbledon champion Andy Murray has pulled out of next week's Rogers Cup in Toronto so he can give his body time to rest before he sets out in defense of his Olympic singles title at the Rio Games.

headline.print_headline: Murray Pulls Out of Toronto Event to Focus on Rio
headline.main: Murray Pulls Out of Toronto Event to Focus on Rio
